en_title: LC: Speech by SJ in moving Committee Stage Amendments of Arbitration (Amendment) Bill 2013
zh_title: 立法會：律政司司長在《2013年仲裁（修訂）條例草案》全體委員會審議階段動議修正案的致辭全文

en: I move the amendments to the clauses read out just now. The amendments to those clauses are set out in the paper distributed to Members.
I have already explained the purposes of the amendments earlier today. The Bills Committee has discussed and expressed support for the above amendments. I urge Members to support these amendments.
zh: 我動議修正剛讀出的條文。這些條文的修正案已載於分發給各位議員的文件。
今日較早時，我亦已解釋修正案的目的。法案委員會已就上述修正案進行討論，並表示支持。謹請各委員支持有關修正案。

en: I move the amendments to the clauses read out just now
The amendments to those clauses are set out in the paper distributed to Members.
I have already explained the purposes of the amendments earlier today
The Bills Committee has discussed and expressed support for the above amendments
I urge Members to support these amendments.
zh: 我動議修正剛讀出的條文
這些條文的修正案已載於分發給各位議員的文件
今日較早時，我亦已解釋修正案的目的
法案委員會已就上述修正案進行討論，並表示支持
謹請各委員支持有關修正案
